com.scriptedmc.script.forge

Class SMCResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scriptedmc.script.internal.ScriptObject<net.minecraft.client.resources.IResource>
      • com.scriptedmc.script.forge.SMCResource

  • @SideOnly(value=CLIENT)
public class SMCResource
extends ScriptObject<net.minecraft.client.resources.IResource>
    Represents any game resource. It could be image file, text file, nbt file or something else loaded by game
